net.hudup.core.alg.cf

Class NeighborCFItemBased

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.AlgAbstract
      • net.hudup.core.alg.RecommenderAbstract
        • net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedRecommenderAbstract
          • net.hudup.core.alg.cf.MemoryBasedCFAbstract
            • net.hudup.core.alg.cf.NeighborCF
              • net.hudup.core.alg.cf.NeighborCFItemBased
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener, Alg, AlgRemote, AlgRemoteTask, MemoryBasedCF, DuplicatableAlg, MemoryBasedAlg, MemoryBasedAlgRemote, MemoryBasedAlgRemoteTask, MemoryBasedRecommender, Recommender, RecommenderRemote, RecommenderRemoteTask, SetupAlgListener, SupportCacheAlg, Exportable, Inspectable

    public class NeighborCFItemBased
extends NeighborCF
implements DuplicatableAlg
    This class sets up the neighbor collaborative filtering (Neighbor CF) algorithm for items. It extends directly NeighborCF class. It is often called Neighbor Item-Based CF because the similar measure is calculated between two item rating vectors (possibly, plus two item profiles). Note, item rating vector contains all ratings of many users on the same item. This class is completed because it defines the estimate(RecommendParam, Set) method.

    There are many authors who contributed measure to this class.
    Authors Shuang-Bo Sun, Zhi-Heng Zhang, Xin-Ling Dong, Heng-Ru Zhang, Tong-Jun Li, Lin Zhang, and Fan Min contributed Triangle measure and TJM measure.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • estimate

        public RatingVector estimate(RecommendParam param,
                             java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> queryIds)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RecommenderRemoteTask
        This method is very important, which is used to estimate rating values of given items (users). Any class that implements this interface must implement this method. Note that the role of user and the role of item are exchangeable. Rating vector can be user rating vector or item rating vector. Please see RatingVector for more details. The input parameters are a recommendation parameter and a set of item (user) identifiers. The output result is a set of predictive or estimated rating values of items (users) specified by the second input parameter.
        Specified by:
        estimate in interface RecommenderRemoteTask
        Parameters:
        param - recommendation parameter. Please see RecommendParam for more details of this parameter.
        queryIds - set of identifications (IDs) of items that need to be estimated their rating values.
        Returns:
        rating vector contains estimated rating values of the specified set of IDs of items (users). Return null if cannot estimate.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • estimate

        public static RatingVector estimate(NeighborCF cf,
                                    RecommendParam param,
                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> queryIds)
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is very important, which is used to estimate rating values of given items (users). Any class that extends this abstract class must implement this method. Note that the role of user and the role of item are exchangeable. Rating vector can be user rating vector or item rating vector. Please see RatingVector for more details. The input parameters are a recommendation parameter and a set of item (user) identifiers. The output result is a set of predictive or estimated rating values of items (users) specified by the second input parameter.
        Parameters:
        cf - current neighbor algorithm.
        param - recommendation parameter. Please see RecommendParam for more details of this parameter.
        queryIds - set of identifications (IDs) of items that need to be estimated their rating values.
        Returns:
        rating vector contains estimated rating values of the specified set of IDs of items (users). Return null if cannot estimate.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • cod

        protected double cod(RatingVector vRating1,
                     RatingVector vRating2,
                     Profile profile1,
                     Profile profile2)
        Description copied from class: NeighborCF
        Calculating the COD (adjusted cosine) measure between two pairs. The first pair includes the first rating vector and the first profile. The second pair includes the second rating vector and the second profile.
        Specified by:
        cod in class NeighborCF
        Parameters:
        vRating1 - first rating vector.
        vRating2 - second rating vector.
        profile1 - first profile.
        profile2 - second profile.
        Returns:
        ACOS measure between both two rating vectors.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: DuplicatableAlg
        Setting the name Declaring the name of algorithm, the name is used to query algorithm in register table. Especially, the name of an algorithm that can be duplicated is retrieved by looking up the field "duplicated_alg_name" in its configuration. If such field does not exist, users define particular name via the returned value of Alg.getName() method.
        Specified by:
        setName in interface DuplicatableAlg
        Parameters:
        name - new name algorithm name.
